name: Mask of Sanity
description:
My name is Tom Bailey, and I'm a private detective. This story started with a murder of a doctor in St. Verginy Psychiatric Hospital. The hospital itself was known as a darn weird place, but I still started the investigation. Some time later I came to a standstill in this case, so on 14th September, 1981, I decided to visit the house of the murdered with the second inspection. And I so wish I left the murder case open...

You’ll have to solve a complex murder case without losing your mind as you approach the truth. Also you have to understand that every tiny decision has its own consequences.

  • Various puzzles and riddles
  • Ability not only to escape from their enemies, but also to kill them
  • Entourage graphics
  • Availability of firearms and melee weapons
